articles.author: Lex Harvey, Esha Mitra
articles.title: Bill Gates cancels AI summit keynote address amid fresh scrutiny over Epstein links - CNN
articles.description: Bill Gates has pulled out of delivering his keynote address at an AI summit in India Thursday, his foundation said, as the billionaire faces scrutiny over his ties to late convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.
